channel.title: Pages on deliberate software
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on deliberate software

item.title: Books That Shape My Thinking
item.description: Books That Shape My Thinking For how I pick what books to prioritize, check out my post “What Book Should I Read Next?”. Bold are my highest recommendations. Programming Languages Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs Let Over Lambda Programming Languages - Application And Interpretation Clojure Programming Haskell And Yesod Algorithm Design Manual Learn You a Haskell The Art of SQL F# 3.0 Javascript the Good Parts People Management Peopleware Reinventing Organizations Emotional Intelligence 2.

item.title: How To: A Career in Programming Without Going To School
item.description: A path to full-time software development "I Just Finished CodeAcademy/Khan Academy/etc, Now What?!" Breaking into a new career can be intimidating! Many people get stuck after finishing an online course like CodeAcademy. We want to provide free guidance necessary to get that dream job. Success Stories We have used this course with several people to help them break into full-time software developer jobs. Rachel B. Rachel was working as a baker when we started together.

item.title: My Philosophy
item.description: Hi, I am Steve Shogren! I am a developer and manager who has met needs in the financial, education, and publishing industries. I grow self-organizing teams and empower them to achieve tremendous business value. My Philosophy Strategic Small, Self-Organizing Teams When carefully mentored, a self-organizing team accomplishes the most business value. Servant Leadership Empowering and trusting your team increases intrinsic motivation, engagement, and productivity.
